item.title: reuqest API
item.author: MelonCholi
item.description: request API 模块 *requests.request(method, url, *kwargs) *requests.get(url, params=None, *kwargs) *requests.options(url, *kwargs) *requests.head(url, *kwargs) *requests.post(url, data=None, json=None, *kwargs) *requests.put(url, data=None, *kwargs) *requests.patch(url, data=None, *kwargs) *requests.delete(url, *kwargs) 除了 requests.request() 外，其余 7 个方法与 http 协
